thread.title: Angola: Brazilian Business People Want to Invest in Agro-Industrial Projects in Malanje
thread.title_full: Angola: Brazilian Business People Want to Invest in Agro-Industrial Projects in Malanje

title: Angola: Brazilian Business People Want to Invest in Agro-Industrial Projects in Malanje
text:
Kenya: Slovak Envoy's Farewell Party 
He stated that within a few months the business delegation from his country will return to the northern Malanje province to identify the municipalities where they can implement their projects. 
He said that Brazilian businessmen are drafting a plan for agricultural and livestock development aimed to define with the local government some value chains to integrate young Angolans in business. 
On his turn, the provincial governor said that the province has potentialities in farming and tourism sectors, thus ensuring that the region has several areas where the entrepreneurs may invest. 
Norberto dos Santos seized the opportunity to invite the Brazilian businessmen to participate in the international conference of investments of Malanje, set for next October. 
He stated that during the conference, the entrepreneurs will have the opportunity to come into contact with some investment plans already drawn up and know the areas where they may invest. Angola
